attributes.action: ensure that Learco Chindamo be deported immediately upon release from prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not acceptable to the British people that a person such as Learco Chindamo, a convicted killer, be allowed to hide behind the Human Rights Law.
This decision beggars belief and flies in the face of natural justice.
It cannot be right or justifable to any fair-minded individual.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
